mapper.sql: id, warehouse_code, quotation_id, contract_code, startDate, expireDate, weight_lower, weight_upper, temperature_type_code, unit_price, continued_item, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, num_upper, num_lower, sku_upper, sku_lower, volume_upper, volume_lower, user_define1, user_define2, user_define3, user_define4, user_define5, first_num, first_price, continued_price
mapper.insert: insert into price_storage_step(warehouse_code, quotation_id, temperature_type_code, unit_price, continued_item, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, num_upper, num_lower,first_num, first_price, continued_price) values ( #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quotationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{continuedItem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numUpper,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{numLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firstNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firstPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{continuedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update price_storage_step set del_flag=1,last_modifier=#{lastModifier},last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime} where quotation_id=#{templateId} and del_flag=0
mapper.select: select ps.quotation_id, ps.weight_lower, ps.weight_upper, ps.temperature_type_code, ps.unit_price, ps.num_upper, ps.num_lower, ps.sku_upper, ps.sku_lower, ps.volume_upper, ps.volume_lower, ps.user_define1, ps.user_define2, ps.user_define3, ps.user_define4, ps.user_define5,ps.continued_item from price_storage_step ps, (SELECT pg.id from price_general_quotation pg LEFT JOIN price_contract_item pi on pi.template_id = pg.quotation_no LEFT JOIN price_contract_info con on con.contract_code = pi.contract_code where pi.contract_code = #{contractCode} and pi.subject_id = #{subjectId} and con.contract_state = '1' and pi.del_flag = 0 and pg.del_flag = 0 ) px where px.id = ps.quotation_id and ps.del_flag = 0

select ps.quotation_id, ps.weight_lower, ps.weight_upper, ps.temperature_type_code, ps.unit_price, ps.num_upper, ps.num_lower, ps.sku_upper, ps.sku_lower, ps.volume_upper, ps.volume_lower, ps.user_define1, ps.user_define2, ps.user_define3, ps.user_define4, ps.user_define5,ps.continued_item from price_storage_step ps left join price_general_quotation pg on pg.id = ps.quotation_id and ps.del_flag = 0 where pg.del_flag = 0 and pg.template_type = 'S'
and pg.subject_id= #{subjectId}
select * from price_storage_step where quotation_id=#{quotationId} and del_flag=0;
